tools.name: search_uniprot
tools.description:
Search for proteins in the UniProt database.
    
    Parameters:
    - query: Search query (e.g., protein name, gene name, or UniProt ID)
    - limit: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_protein_by_id
tools.description:
Retrieve detailed information about a protein by UniProt ID.
    
    Parameters:
    - uniprot_id: The UniProt identifier (e.g., P12345)

tools.name: get_protein_sequences
tools.description:
Retrieve the amino acid sequence of a protein by UniProt ID.
    
    Parameters:
    - uniprot_id: The UniProt identifier (e.g., P12345)

tools.name: get_protein_functions
tools.description:
Retrieve the functional annotations of a protein by UniProt ID.
    
    Parameters:
    - uniprot_id: The UniProt identifier (e.g., P12345)

tools.name: get_protein_structures
tools.description:
Retrieve structure information (PDB IDs) related to a protein by UniProt ID.
    
    Parameters:
    - uniprot_id: The UniProt identifier (e.g., P12345)
